infofilter
Class URLReaderAgent

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--ciagent.CIAgent
        |
        +--infofilter.URLReaderAgent
public class URLReaderAgent
extends CIAgent

The URLReaderAgent class implements an agent that reads web pages and optionally pass parameters to the page.

See Also:
